Posts.Content:
My son was diagnosed with Leukemia back in December. He is 25 years old. Here is a website that will give lots of info. It also has a phone number you can call. The people there are very helpful. This website also has a chat you can talk with people who are going through similar situations. 
I hope this helps 
 
http://www.leukemia-lymphoma.org/all_page.adp?item_id=386151
Posts.Title: Lukemia
